title: [NA] Silver Team Seeking: JGL
body:
Team Elo Complexity is looking for Jungle main, one that has a large jungle pool and is confident on more than just a few champions. 
You must be no higher than Silver 1 and being Gold last season is a dis-qualifier.  Must be able to be on for practice M-F 5PM PST.

Adding me in game will be declined.
Fill out below to be added.

IGN:
Age:
Current Rank:
Top 4 Champions:
Greatest Strengths:

replies.body:
IGN: Youngster

Rank: Silver 5

Mains: Riven, Irelia, but open and wanting to play out of comfort champions to learn and have a better understanding of the game as a whole

Secondaries: Fizz Kennen Jax.... list can go on

Strengths: I analyze every bad play to understand what i could have done in that situation to fix the play.  I see my mistakes as they happen.  I learn something new every few games i play. I was bronze 4 2 weeks ago. I can shot call.. but better at it as the jungler.  I believe that i have a decent understanding of playing from behind.. and i know that if i win early the game is over at the elo i am at.  I have a drive to get better at anything i do.. Skateboarding Gloving Writing Music.... and league is my main focus right now.

Weaknesses:  There are some times where i get frustrated at the game... and it will take me off focus and ill find myself tilting but i am working on keeping it under control.  Sometimes when im ahead i will tend to get cocky and lose focus and throw a game. but i think now i have fixed that after noticing the problem.

What i am looking for:  I am looking for a team to not be afraid to give me constructive criticism and also be able to take constructive criticism without getting offended and through that better ourselves as players.  My ultimate goal is diamond or master tier and becoming an elo booster one day.

IGN: Hi Im Chai
Rank: S3 
Top 4: Lee, Kha, Nunu, Nid
Strength: aggressive playmaking jungler

IGN: Youngster
CR: Silver 5
Top 4:  Nunu. Vi. Kha. Zac
GS: Being able to see my mistakes as they happen. Shotcall
